trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> class.
An array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that provides the properties for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션에 대 한 속성을 제공 하는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> class, which is optionally read-only.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> 클래스는 필요에 따라 읽기 전용입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that provides the properties for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션에 대 한 속성을 제공 하는입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, specifies that the collection cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 컬렉션을 수정할 수를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that was added to the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Removes all <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects from the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Returns whether the collection contains the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to find in the collection.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션에는 주어진 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to an array, starting at the specified index number.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스 번호에서 시작 하 여 배열에 전체 컬렉션을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects to copy elements of the collection to.
trans-unit.target: 배열을 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 개체를 컬렉션의 요소에 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the `array` parameter at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 `array` 매개 변수에서 복사가 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of property descriptors in the collection.
You can use the Count property to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 컬렉션을 반복 하는 루프의 제한을 설정 하려면 Count 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션은 0에서 사용 하 여 되므로 `Count - 1` 루프의 상한값으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of property descriptors in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 대 한 속성 설명자의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an empty collection that you can use instead of creating a new one with no items.
trans-unit.target: 항목이 없는로 새 레코드를 만드는 대신 사용할 수 있는 빈 컬렉션을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> 필드는 읽기 전용입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Returns the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> with the specified name, using a Boolean to indicate whether to ignore case.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 지정한 이름의 사용 하 여 부울 값을 대/소문자 무시 여부를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to return from the collection.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you want to ignore the case of the property name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>속성 이름의 대/소문자 무시 하려는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> with the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 지정한 이름의 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 속성이 존재 하지 않는 경우.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에 대 한 열거자를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
Returns the index of the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to return the index of.
The index of the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
Adds the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to the collection at the specified index number.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 를 컬렉션에 지정된 된 인덱스 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index at which to add the `value` parameter to the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to add to the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Sorts the members of this collection, using the specified <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> 를 사용 하 여이 컬렉션의 멤버를 정렬

trans-unit.source: A comparer to use to sort the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 사용할 비교자는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the members of this collection.
The specified order is applied first, followed by the default sort for this collection, which is usually alphabetical.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 순서 대로, 대개 사전순이 컬렉션에 대 한 기본 정렬 뒤에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings describing the order in which to sort the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 사용 되는 순서를 설명 하는 문자열의 배열에서 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> at the specified index number.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 에 지정된 된 인덱스 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index number is zero-based.
Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to access that <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 숫자 위치는 특정 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> 액세스할 수</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> 에서 1 빼야

trans-unit.source: For example, to get the third <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, you need to specify `myColl[2]`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 세 번째 가져오려는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>를 지정 하면 `myColl[2]`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 인덱스는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> with the specified index number.
The index parameter is not a valid index for Item.
trans-unit.target: index 매개 변수는 항목에 대 한 유효한 인덱스가 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> with the specified name.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property is case-sensitive when searching for names.
That is, the names "Pname" and "pname" are considered to be two different properties.
trans-unit.target: 즉, "Pname"과 "pname" 이름이 두 개의 서로 다른 속성으로 간주 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to get from the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> with the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 지정한 이름의 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 속성이 존재 하지 않는 경우.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Removes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> at the specified index from the collection.
The index of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 는 컬렉션에서 제거할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
Sorts the members of this collection, using the default sort for this collection, which is usually alphabetical.
trans-unit.target: 대개 사전순이 컬렉션에 대해 기본 정렬을 사용 하 여이 컬렉션의 멤버를 정렬 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the sorted <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> 포함 하는 정렬 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the members of this collection, using the specified <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> 를 사용 하 여이 컬렉션의 멤버를 정렬

trans-unit.source: A comparer to use to sort the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 사용할 비교자는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> 포함 하는 정렬 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the members of this collection.
The specified order is applied first, followed by the default sort for this collection, which is usually alphabetical.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 순서 대로, 대개 사전순이 컬렉션에 대 한 기본 정렬 뒤에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings describing the order in which to sort the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 사용 되는 순서를 설명 하는 문자열의 배열에서 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the sorted <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> 포함 하는 정렬 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the members of this collection.
The specified order is applied first, followed by the sort using the specified <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 순서 대로 먼저 적용 된 여 <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> 지정된을 사용 하 여 정렬

trans-unit.source: An array of strings describing the order in which to sort the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 사용 되는 순서를 설명 하는 문자열의 배열에서 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A comparer to use to sort the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 사용할 비교자는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 이 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the sorted <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> 포함 하는 정렬 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 포함 된 요소의 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 스레드로부터 안전한 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스가 동기화 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션에 대 한 액세스가 경우 동기화 (스레드로부터 안전함). 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> 에 제공 된 키와 값을 가진 요소를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to use as the key of the element to add.
The <xref:System.Object> to use as the value of the element to add.
The collection is read-only.
value is .
Removes all elements from the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
Determines whether the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> contains an element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 결정 여부는 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>지정된 된 키가 있는 요소가 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> contains an element with the key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>; 키가 있는 요소가 포함 그렇지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에 대 한 열거자를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>크기가 고정된 되어 있습니다.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>고정 되어 고, 그렇지 않으면 크기가 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is read-only.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>읽기 전용, 되지 않았으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 키를 가진 요소를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to get or set.
The element with the specified key.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the keys of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the keys of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
Removes the element with the specified key from the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> 에서 지정한 키를 가진 요소를 제거

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to remove.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the values in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing the values in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
Adds an item to the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
The item to add to the collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
Removes all items from the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Determines whether the collection contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 특정 값이 포함 되어 있는지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The item to locate in the collection.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is found in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션에 항목이 발견 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 지정된 된 항목의 인덱스를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The item to locate in the collection.
The index of value if found in the list, otherwise -1.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스 value 경우-1 반환 목록에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 항목을 컬렉션 내의 지정한 인덱스에 삽입 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
The item to insert into the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 크기가 고정 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션의 크기가 고정 되어 있으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 읽기 전용인 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션이 읽기 전용인 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an item from the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 지정된 된 인덱스에 항목을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 설정할 항목의&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
The collection is read-only.
value is not a .
index is less than 0.
-or- index is equal to or greater than .
Removes the first occurrence of a specified value from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 맨 처음 발견 되는 지정 된 값을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the collection.
The collection is read-only.
Removes the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에 항목을 제거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
The collection is read-only.
